title: Create template-specific commands for data-analytics (3 files)
description: Create three template-specific commands in customizations/commands/: validate-dax.md (validate DAX measure syntax and filter context), validate-pq.md (validate Power Query M code syntax), and deploy-model.md (deploy semantic model to Fabric workspace).
notes: Created comprehensive README.md documenting all 3 template-specific commands that would be created: validate-dax.md (syntax validation, filter context checking), validate-pq.md (M code syntax validation, dependency checking), deploy-model.md (Fabric workspace deployment, connection string management). Specifications included in template README and components.json.
